The British Government should start taking steps towards reparations for the British Empire and the suffering of the colonists:

1. Payments to be made for the suffering caused, along these lines: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1315869/Germany-end-World-War-One-reparations-92-years-59m-final-payment.html

2. Free social housing for all people of former colonies

3. Visa being abolished for citizens of former colonies and instant citizenship

4. Child-Benefits being doubled to ethnic people for hardship

5. Extra holidays to allow the cultivation of ties with the motherland

6. All school children being sent to one of the colonies to see how life was under the great empire

7. Bengali/Hindi/Urdu/Yoruba etc. being recognised as official languages, the prime minister must give one speech a year at least in this language
